name: Rahukaalam
description:
Your professor at the space institute seems to be possessed after he landed on the moon. Investigate him.

WASD:Move, MB1:Shoot, MB2:Melee, Space:Jump, Ctrl:Crouch, Shift:Walk, E:Use, P:Pause, Tab:PDA (Enter and exit PDA to recapture mouse)

Read objectives and picked up notes and story items in the PDA.

Warning for browser version: Crouching and Moving Forwad (Ctrl+W) will close the tab in most common browsers. Just avoid crouch. Its not really needed.

If the web version has issues, try the windows version.

All third party assets are Public Domain and are credited in game.

Game was made within 14 days for the Cosmic Horrors jam and the 32 bit jam of October 2022.
